files.README.md:
# ClaudeForge Marketplace
![Version](https://img.shields.io/badge/version-1.2.0-blue.svg) ![Plugins](https://img.shields.io/badge/plugins-161-success.svg) ![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-green.svg) ![Claude Code](https://img.shields.io/badge/Claude%20Code-compatible-purple.svg) ![Stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/claudeforge/marketplace?style=social) **The Ultimate Plugin Ecosystem for Claude Code** *161 Enterprise-Grade Plugins | 93 AI Agents | 65 Commands | 3 Super Plugins* [Get Started](#-quick-start) [Browse Plugins](#-featured-categories) [Documentation](#-documentation) [Contributing](#-contributing)
--- ## What's New in v1.2
### Plugin Compliance & Quality All 161 plugins validated for Claude Code CLI **Fixes Applied:** - Removed invalid `commands` field from 65 command plugins - All plugin.json files validated - Auto-discovery pattern for commands - Super plugins structure retained ### Super Plugins (Advanced) Multi-component platforms with hooks & MCP servers **Features:** - AI Agent orchestration - Enterprise workspace management - Complete DevOps automation - Real-time state tracking - Event-driven workflows
--- ## Why ClaudeForge Marketplace?

Curated Quality

Every plugin manually reviewed & enterprise-tested

Production Ready

Battle-tested in real-world scenarios

Security First

Zero dependencies, fully audited code

Advanced Features

Hooks, MCP servers, automation

100% Original

No copycat plugins, pure innovation
--- ## Quick Start ### Installation ```bash # One command to rule them all /plugin marketplace add https://github.com/claudeforge/marketplace.git # Verify installation /plugin marketplace list # Expected: claudeforge-marketplace (1.2.0) - 161 plugins available ``` ### Using Plugins ```bash # Browse available plugins /plugin # Install specific plugin /plugin install ai-architect@claudeforge-marketplace # Install super plugin (with hooks & MCP) /plugin install enterprise-workspace@claudeforge-marketplace # Manage plugins /plugin list # List installed /plugin update ai-architect@claudeforge-marketplace # Update plugin /plugin remove debugger@claudeforge-marketplace # Remove plugin ``` --- ## Featured Categories
AI & Machine Learning (12 plugins) - **ai-architect** - ML optimization & AI system design - **ai-ethics-officer** - Ethical AI governance - **vision-specialist** - Computer vision & image processing - **data-scientist** - Data analysis & BigQuery operations - **data-analyst** - Analytics & business intelligence
Security & Compliance (15 plugins) - **enterprise-security-reviewer** - B2B security assessments - **security-scanner** - Vulnerability detection & remediation - **authentication-specialist** - JWT, OAuth2, security patterns - **cors-security-expert** - CORS configuration & best practices - **data-privacy-engineer** - GDPR compliance & data protection - **compliance-automation-specialist** - Regulatory automation - **legal-compliance-checker** - Legal compliance validation

| Category | Count | Description | |----------|-------|-------------| | **Agents** | 93 | AI-powered development assistants | | **Commands** | 65 | Instant productivity tools | | **Super Plugins** | 3 | Advanced multi-component platforms | | **Total** | **161** | **Production-ready plugins** |
### Quality Metrics - **Average Documentation**: 250+ lines per plugin - **Code Examples**: Real-world templates included - **Testing**: Enterprise-grade validation - **Security**: Zero external dependencies - **Maintenance**: Regular updates & improvements --- ## Architecture ``` claudeforge-marketplace/ .claude-plugin/ marketplace.json # Marketplace registry (161 plugins) plugins/ agents/ # 93 AI Agent Plugins ai-architect/ .claude-plugin/ plugin.json agents/ ai-engineer.md database-expert/ NEW in v1.1 docker-specialist/ NEW in v1.1 git-workflow-expert/ NEW in v1.1 ... (90 more agents) commands/ # 65 Command Plugins api-designer/ .claude-plugin/ plugin.json commands/ api-designer.md env-validator/ NEW in v1.1 import-organizer/ NEW in v1.1 ... (62 more commands) super/ # 3 Super Plugins enterprise-workspace/ .claude-plugin/ plugin.json # With hooks & MCP commands/ # Multiple commands agents/ # Multiple agents scripts/ # Automation scripts servers/ # MCP servers ai-studio-orchestrator/ devops-platform/ README.md # This file ``` --- ## Documentation ### Plugin Installation Examples ```bash # AI & Machine Learning /plugin install ai-architect@claudeforge-marketplace /plugin install data-scientist@claudeforge-marketplace /plugin install vision-specialist@claudeforge-marketplace # Development Tools /plugin install web-dev@claudeforge-marketplace /plugin install python-expert@claudeforge-marketplace /plugin install debugger@claudeforge-marketplace # Security & Compliance /plugin install security-scanner@claudeforge-marketplace /plugin install authentication-specialist@claudeforge-marketplace /plugin install cors-security-expert@claudeforge-marketplace # DevOps & Infrastructure /plugin install devops-automator@claudeforge-marketplace /plugin install docker-specialist@claudeforge-marketplace /plugin install cloud-architect@claudeforge-marketplace # Productivity Commands /plugin install code-review@claudeforge-marketplace /plugin install fix-github-issue@claudeforge-marketplace /plugin install pr-creator@claudeforge-marketplace # Super Plugins (Advanced) /plugin install enterprise-workspace@claudeforge-marketplace /plugin install ai-studio-orchestrator@claudeforge-marketplace /plugin install devops-platform@claudeforge-marketplace ``` ### Marketplace Management ```bash # List installed marketplaces /plugin marketplace list # Update marketplace /plugin marketplace update claudeforge-marketplace # Remove marketplace /plugin marketplace remove claudeforge-marketplace # Search plugins /plugin search "security" /plugin search "api design" # Show plugin details /plugin info ai-architect@claudeforge-marketplace ``` --- ## Troubleshooting
Marketplace Not Loading **Symptoms:** Marketplace doesn't appear in `/plugin marketplace list` **Solutions:** 1. Verify `.claude-plugin/marketplace.json` exists in repository root 2. Check JSON syntax: `claude plugin validate .` 3. Ensure Git repository is accessible and cloned correctly 4. Restart Claude Code CLI after adding marketplace
Plugin Installation Failures **Symptoms:** Error message "Plugin not found" or installation timeout **Solutions:** 1. Verify plugin source paths are correct: `./plugins/[type]/[name]` 2. Ensure all required files exist: `.claude-plugin/plugin.json`, `commands/*.md` or `agents/*.md` 3. Check network connectivity for Git-based plugin sources 4. Try explicit version: `/plugin install [name]@claudeforge-marketplace@1.0.0`
Super Plugin Issues **Symptoms:** Hooks not triggering or MCP server connection errors **Solutions:** 1. Verify `${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT}` environment variable resolves correctly 2. Check script permissions: `chmod +x` on Linux/Mac 3. Ensure Node.js is installed for MCP server JavaScript files 4. Review Claude Code logs for hook execution errors
Performance Issues **Symptoms:** Slow marketplace loading or plugin installation **Solutions:** 1. Check internet connection speed (GitHub clone performance) 2. Verify available disk space (minimum 50MB required) 3. Close unnecessary applications to free system resources 4. Use local path installation for faster access after initial clone
--- ## Contributing We welcome contributions! Here's how you can help: ### Contributing New Plugins 1. Fork the repository 2. Create plugin structure in appropriate directory (`agents/`, `commands/`, or `super/`) 3. Follow `plugin.json` schema requirements 4. Add comprehensive documentation (200-700+ lines recommended) 5. Test thoroughly with Claude Code CLI 6. Submit pull request with detailed description ### Plugin Quality Standards - Minimum 200 lines of documentation - Real-world code examples and templates - Phase-based methodologies - Best practices and anti-patterns - Quality metrics and KPIs - Business impact analysis ### Contributing Ideas - Open a GitHub Discussion with plugin proposal - Describe use case and business value - Provide examples of desired functionality - Community votes on most valuable additions --- ## Security & Trust > **Important Disclaimer** **ClaudeForge Marketplace is an independent, community-driven project** - **NOT** affiliated with Anthropic or Claude - **NOT** officially endorsed or connected to Anthropic - **Community maintained** by open-source contributors - **Use at your own risk** - review plugin code before production use ### Security Measures
**Our Practices:** - Security vulnerability scanning - Static code analysis - Zero third-party dependencies - Open source transparency - Community moderation - Regular security audits **Your Responsibilities:** - Review plugin source code - Test in development first - Report security issues on GitHub - Keep plugins updated - Follow least privilege principle - Read documentation carefully
